foods.recipe: Hummus is a creamy dip made from cooked chickpeas, tahini (sesame paste), garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil. It is typically served with pita bread or fresh vegetables as an appetizer or snack.

Tabbouleh is a refreshing salad made with finely chopped parsley, tomatoes, mint, bulgur wheat, lemon juice, and olive oil. It is a popular dish in Mediterranean cuisine, known for its bright flavors and nutritious ingredients.
Falafel is a deep-fried patty made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, mixed with herbs, spices, and onion. It is often served in pita bread with tahini sauce, fresh vegetables, and pickles.

Moussaka is a layered casserole dish made with eggplant, ground meat (usually lamb), tomatoes, onions, and a b√©chamel sauce. It is baked until golden and bubbly, creating a hearty and flavorful main course.

Greek Salad, also known as Horiatiki, is a refreshing salad made with tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese. It is dressed with olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs, offering a tangy and savory combination.

Shawarma is a popular street food in the Mediterranean region, consisting of thinly sliced meat (such as chicken, beef, or lamb) marinated in spices, roasted on a vertical spit, and served in a wrap or pita bread with vegetables and sauces.

Spanakopita is a Greek savory pastry made with phyllo dough filled with a mixture of spinach, feta cheese, onions, and herbs. It is baked until golden and crispy, creating a delicious appetizer or side dish.

Tzatziki is a refreshing yogurt-based dip or sauce made with Greek yogurt, cucumbers, garlic, lemon juice, and fresh herbs like dill or mint. It is often served with grilled meats, pita bread, or as a condiment for Mediterranean dishes.
